entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Matane
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:36 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Rain, -4.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mont-Joli Airport 3:51 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Rain
Temperature: -4.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 48.3 km
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -6.5°C
Wind: NE 42 km/h gust 55 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Freezing rain or snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to snow near midnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of freezing drizzle. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Light snow changing to periods of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of freezing drizzle. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
